body:
> @Osmose I'm feeling a lot of déjà vu fixing this. Do you think this was messed up in the merge?

What's weird is that I'm not sure. IIRC this is a shape of fix we applied, but it wasn't because of a leftover observer (which is what I'm guessing this is fixing), but instead because of `stopObserver` failing because an observer didn't exist. I may be remembering incorrectly.

In any case, merge commits are hard.
body_html:
@Osmose I'm feeling a lot of déjà vu fixing this. Do you think this was messed up in the merge?

What's weird is that I'm not sure. IIRC this is a shape of fix we applied, but it wasn't because of a leftover observer (which is what I'm guessing this is fixing), but instead because of stopObserver failing because an observer didn't exist. I may be remembering incorrectly.

In any case, merge commits are hard.
